description: After over 36 years of experience serving incredibly tasty food in over 30 countries, Chef Tito is bringing his culinary prowess to the streets of Kansas City, as he cruises his fully equipped kitchen (even complete with a hickory smoker) through town, whipping up American Fusion cuisine that is hands down delicious. You can taste Tito’s passion for flavor and fun in every one of his dishes. From Cochinita Pibil, to BBQ Pulled Pork, to Fish Tacos, it's completely understandable that this wonderful food is the talk of all of Kansas City. So for the best flavors from the land of the free, follow the flag of American Fusion.
name: American Fusion
